# estimatedOutputFileLength

**Instance Property**

The estimated length of the exported file, in bytes.

## Declaration

```swift
var estimatedOutputFileLength: Int64 { get }
```

## Estimating file length and duration

- **estimateOutputFileLength(completionHandler:)**: Starts estimating the output file length of the export while considering the asset, preset, and time range configuration of the export session.
